body_html: This seems to be because the inclusion is only there if you invoke it from the root CMakeLists.txt file, which further includes cmake/MiscCheck.cmake. In this case, it seems that the error is from torch/lib/build/libshm/ which is using setup.py and Extension (IIRC) which does not have that cmake path. I wrote up a quick fix at #8271 but my laptop has a newer CMake, so I will have to check it when I get back home today. Basically I moved the inclusion logic directly to public/cuda.cmake and included that as part of the installation too.
